name: 哈辛托·维加·斯皮里托夫
name_en: 哈辛托·维加·斯皮里托夫 Jacinto Vega SpiritWolf
name_full: 哈辛托·维加·斯皮里托夫 Jacinto Vega SpiritWolf
introduction: Jacinto "Spiritwolf" Vega is a longstanding Massachusetts contributor to the arts. With more than two decades providing entertainment camera work from behind the lens, Spiritwolf has traveled the US creating the display posters for half a dozen Las Vegas Hotels in the 1990's and even provided imagery for Disney resorts in Florida during that time.Often called upon to support the music, stage arts and live performance scene in Central Massachusetts, it was the producers of the film Crooked Arrows that saw the potential in Spiritwolf's natural outward personality and gave him time in front of the lens. Spiritwolf's Native American image, cultural attributes and deep knowledge of his heritage make him the perfect face for any film that encapsulates the traditions or genuine visual display of Native American culture.
